00027 void CnipolScalerHists::BookHists()
00028 {
00029    fDir->cd();
00030 
00031    char hName[256];
00032    TH1* hist;
00033 
00034    //TDirectory *dir = new TDirectoryFile("scalers", "scalers", "", fDir);
00035    //DrawObjContainer *scalers = new DrawObjContainer(dir);
00036 
00037    sprintf(hName, "hBunches");
00038    hist = new TH1F(hName, hName, 120, 0, 120);
00039    hist->SetTitle("; Bunch Id; Events;");
00040    o[hName] = hist;
00041 
00042    sprintf(hName, "hKinEnergy");
00043    hist = new TH2F(hName, hName, 16, 200, 1000, 64, 0, 128);
00044    hist->SetOption("colz LOGZ");
00045    hist->SetTitle("; Kinematic Energy, keV; Time, ns;");
00046    o[hName] = hist;
00047 
00048    ChannelSetIter iCh = gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.begin();
00049 
00050    for (; iCh!=gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.end(); ++iCh)
00051    {
00052       string sCh("  ");
00053       sprintf(&sCh[0], "%02d", *iCh);
00054 
00055       // Corresponds to 200 histograms in rhic2hbook.f
00056       sprintf(hName, "hBunches_ch%s", sCh.c_str());
00057       hist = new TH1I(hName, hName, 120, 0, 120);
00058       hist->SetTitle("; Bunch Id; Events;");
00059       o[hName] = hist;
00060 
00061       // Corresponds to 300 histograms in rhic2hbook.f
00062       sprintf(hName, "hKinEnergy_ch%s", sCh.c_str());
00063       hist = new TH2I(hName, hName, 16, 200, 1000, 64, 0, 128);
00064       hist->SetOption("colz LOGZ");
00065       hist->SetTitle("; Kinematic Energy, keV; Time, ns;");
00066       o[hName] = hist;
00067    }
00068 }

00074 void CnipolScalerHists::Fill(int32_t *hData, UShort_t chId)
00075 {
00076    string sCh("  ");
00077    char   hName[256];
00078 
00079    sprintf(&sCh[0], "%02d", chId);
00080 
00081    Double_t hData1[128+2];//, hData5[1024+2];
00082 
00083    // convert input array to doubles with under/overflows
00084    for (int i=0,   j=1; i<128;  i++, j++) hData1[j] = hData[i];
00085    //for (int i=512, j=1; i<1536; i++, j++) hData5[j] = hData[i];
00086 
00087    sprintf(hName, "hBunches_ch%s", sCh.c_str());
00088    TH1* hBunchesChannel = (TH1*) o[hName];
00089    hBunchesChannel->SetContent(hData1); // -1 because there is an underflow bin
00090 
00091    sprintf(hName, "hBunches");
00092    TH1* hBunchesAllChannels = (TH1*) o[hName];
00093    hBunchesAllChannels->Add(hBunchesChannel);
00094 
00095    sprintf(hName, "hKinEnergy_ch%s", sCh.c_str());
00096    TH1* hTmpPtr = (TH1*) o[hName];
00097    //((TH1*) o[hName])->SetContent(hData5);
00098 
00099    for (Int_t ix=1; ix<=hTmpPtr->GetNbinsX(); ix++) {
00100       for (Int_t iy=1; iy<=hTmpPtr->GetNbinsY(); iy++) {
00101          
00102          Int_t ib = 512 + ix-1 + (hTmpPtr->GetNbinsX())*(iy-1);
00103          double content = hData[ib];
00104          //printf("ix, iy, ib, content: %d, %d, %d, %f\n", ix, iy, ib, content);
00105          hTmpPtr->SetBinContent(ix, iy, content);
00106       }
00107    }
00108 
00109    sprintf(hName, "hKinEnergy");
00110    TH1* hKinEnergyAllChannels = (TH1*) o[hName];
00111    hKinEnergyAllChannels->Add(hTmpPtr);
00112 
00113 }
